enumeratedValues.name: powered_up
enumeratedValues.description: Zero cross detetion function powered up

enumeratedValues.name: powered_down
enumeratedValues.description: Zero cross detetion function powered down

enumeratedValues.name: xtal_clk
enumeratedValues.description: If DISABLE_AUTO_CLK_SWITCH is set to 0 and 24M xtal is OK, the clock source will switch from internal ring OSC to 24M xtal automatically

enumeratedValues.name: sel_clk
enumeratedValues.description: If DISABLE_AUTO_CLK_SWITCH is set to 1, SEL_CLK will determine which clock source the DCDC uses

PWD_CUR_SNS_CMP.name: PWD_CUR_SNS_CMP
PWD_CUR_SNS_CMP.description: Power down signal of the current detector.

enumeratedValues.name: select_zero
enumeratedValues.description: In Run Mode, 1 A. In Power Save Mode, 0.25 A

enumeratedValues.name: select_one
enumeratedValues.description: In Run Mode, 2 A. In Power Save Mode, 0.25 A

enumeratedValues.name: select_two
enumeratedValues.description: In Run Mode, 1 A. In Power Save Mode, 0.2 A

enumeratedValues.name: select_three
enumeratedValues.description: In Run Mode, 2 A. In Power Save Mode, 0.2 A

enumeratedValues.name: enabled
enumeratedValues.description: Low voltage detection comparator is enabled

enumeratedValues.name: disabled
enumeratedValues.description: Low voltage detection comparator is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: disabled
enumeratedValues.description: Overload Detection in power save mode disabled

enumeratedValues.name: enabled
enumeratedValues.description: Overload Detection in power save mode enabled

enumeratedValues.name: lp_12p5mV
enumeratedValues.description: Adjust hysteretic value in low power to 12.5mV

enumeratedValues.name: lp_25mV
enumeratedValues.description: Adjust hysteretic value in low power to 25mV

enumeratedValues.name: disabled
enumeratedValues.description: Disable xtalok detection circuit and always outputs OK signal "1"

REG_FBK_SEL.name: REG_FBK_SEL
REG_FBK_SEL.description: Select the feedback point of the internal regulator

enumeratedValues.name: reg_fbk_sel0
enumeratedValues.description: The regulator outputs 1.0V with 1.2V reference voltage

enumeratedValues.name: reg_fbk_sel1
enumeratedValues.description: The regulator outputs 1.1V with 1.2V reference voltage

enumeratedValues.name: reg_fbk_sel2
enumeratedValues.description: The regulator outputs 1.0V with 1.3V reference voltage

enumeratedValues.name: reg_fbk_sel3
enumeratedValues.description: The regulator outputs 1.1V with 1.3V reference voltage

REG_RLOAD_SW.name: REG_RLOAD_SW
REG_RLOAD_SW.description: This controls the load resistor of the internal regulator of DCDC

enumeratedValues.name: low_hyst_thresh
enumeratedValues.description: Lower hysteresis threshold (about 2.5mV in typical, but this value can vary with PVT corners

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: Disable hysteresis in switching converter common mode analog comparators

enumeratedValues.name: enable
enumeratedValues.description: Enable hysteresis in switching converter common mode analog comparators

LOOPCTRL_DC_FF.name: LOOPCTRL_DC_FF
LOOPCTRL_DC_FF.description: Two's complement feed forward step in duty cycle in the switching DC-DC converter

LOOPCTRL_RCSCALE_THRSH.name: LOOPCTRL_RCSCALE_THRSH
LOOPCTRL_RCSCALE_THRSH.description: Increase the threshold detection for RC scale circuit.

enumeratedValues.name: no_increase_thrsh
enumeratedValues.description: Do not increase the threshold detection for RC scale circuit.

enumeratedValues.name: increase_thrsh
enumeratedValues.description: Increase the threshold detection for RC scale circuit.

LOOPCTRL_HYST_SIGN.name: LOOPCTRL_HYST_SIGN
LOOPCTRL_HYST_SIGN.description: Invert the sign of the hysteresis in DC-DC analog comparators.

enumeratedValues.name: noinvert
enumeratedValues.description: Do not invert sign of the hysteresis

enumeratedValues.name: idle
enumeratedValues.description: DCDC will be idle to save current dissipation when the duty cycle get to the low limit which is set by NEGLIMIT_IN.

enumeratedValues.name: not_idle
enumeratedValues.description: DCDC will keep working with the low limited duty cycle NEGLIMIT_IN.

MINPWR_DC_HALFCLK.name: MINPWR_DC_HALFCLK
MINPWR_DC_HALFCLK.description: Set DCDC clock to half frequency for continuous mode

enumeratedValues.name: fullfreq
enumeratedValues.description: DCDC clock remains at full frequency for continuous mode

enumeratedValues.name: halffreq
enumeratedValues.description: DCDC clock set to half frequency for continuous mode

enumeratedValues.name: enable
enumeratedValues.description: Enable stepping for the output of VDD_SOC of DCDC

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: Disable stepping for the output of VDD_SOC of DCDC
